questions.question: Java is a high-level language.
questions.Explanation: Java is a high-level language because it is more easily understood by humans, Low=-level languages are always static.

questions.question: What kind of language is java?
What is the result of 24 % 5?
questions.Explanation: % finds the remainder of an expression, the remainder of 24/5 being 4

questions.question: What is the default value of an integer?
questions.Explanation: When an integer is called and not defined, the default value is 0

questions.question: What is the default value of an object?
questions.Explanation: When an object is not defined, the default value is Not Assigned

questions.question: Is it possible to have multiple classes in the same java file?
questions.Explanation: It is possible to have multiple classes in the same java file.

questions.question: What does multiple inheritance mean?
options: Multiple classes inheriting from more super classes
Multiple classes inheriting from one super class
One class inheriting from multiple super classes
questions.answer: One class inheriting from multiple super classes
questions.Explanation: Multiple inheritance in java allows for one class to inherit from multiple super classes.

questions.question: What is the process that involves recognizing and focusing on the important characteristics of a situation or object is known as
questions.Explanation: Abstraction is the process that involves recognizing and focusing on the important characteristics of a situation or object.

questions.question: Is it possible to change the length of an array after it is made?
Is it possible to change the length of an arraylist after it is made?
questions.Explanation: Arraylists are not static in length.
